    • sendNPRM

      static boolean sendNPRM(Receiver rcvr, byte[] msg) throws MidiUnavailableException, InvalidMidiDataException
      Sends NPRM messages to the midi device. For Yamaha devices, nprm messages can either use 3 or 4 midi events depending on the resolution of the parameter, e.g. a most parameters like pan, needs only 3 events, while a fader move requires 4 events.
      Parameters:
      rcvr -
      msg -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      MidiUnavailableException
      InvalidMidiDataException
